page.title: 08Simon's Weekend - Sunday
page.content: On Sunday I got up at 7am. and fed the cats. I made Mummy and Daddy a cup of tea and then I tucked into bed with them. I had Weetabix with yoghurt for breakfast. In the morning Nick, our neighbours' grandson, came to play. We looked in both our gardens for frogs,toads and newts. Nick fell into the neighbour's pond but I helped him out. We had salad and barbecued steak for lunch.I made an apple crumble for pudding. In the afternoon I went to the Electric Palace cinema with Nick to see "Never Ending Story" and "Burgers and Beans". I had a cheese sandwich for tea. I had a bath and then a long story read by Daddy and went to bed at 7.30pm.
